business_details.Business: Case record is received on transfer from Special Judge, Dhubri for trial. On perusal, it reveals that the accused Nur Jamal Hoque is on baiol. Issue summon to the accused Nur Jamal Hoque.

Summon to accused Nur Jamal Hoque returned after service.Seen the petition No. 1182/20 filed by the accused Nur Jamal Hoque praying for allowing him to go on regular bail.Perused the order dated 29.08.19 passed in Case No. AB 2400/19 of the Honourable Gauhati High Court, Guwahati. It reveals that the interim previous bail granted earlier vide order dated 30.07.19 is made absolute. The bail so granted is not altered/modified/cancelled by the Honourable Gauhati High Court.In view of the above facts, the petition seeking bail is allowed.Bail bond for the accused Nur Jamal Hoque has been submitted by his bailor Saminul Hoque. The same is checked, verified and accepted.

Accused person is present. Heard both sides. I have perused the FIR, th statement of the victim recorded U/s. 164 Cr.P.C., the medical report, the seizure list and also the statement of other witnesses. There are sufficient materials to frame charge U/s. 4 of POCSO Act against the accused person. Accordingly, charge is read over and explained to the accused persons to which he pleaded not guilty and claimed trial. Issue summons to the witnesses.

Accused Nur Jamal Hoque is present.Victim Fatema Khatun is present. She is examined, cross examined and discharged.Witness Ajbahatan Bewa is allowed to go on P.R. bond of Rs. 500/- (Rupees five hundred) only.

Case record is put up before me as the P.O. is on C.L. Accused Nur Jamal is present. Seen the petition No. 48/20 filed by the learned counsel for the accused praying for allowing him to retire from this case. The petition be placed on next date. Witness Ajbahaton Bewa is absent without steps. Issue BWA against witness Ajbahaton Bewa.
Accused as well witnesses are absent due to Lock down. Issue fresh summon to witnesses.
